Package com.gsma.services.rcs.chat

This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.

See: Description

    Chat
    Chat
    ChatIntent
    Intent for chat conversation
    ChatListener
    Chat event listener
    ChatLog
    Content provider for chat history

    Group chat

    Chat message from a single chat or group chat

    Direction of the message

    Chat message
    ChatService
    Chat service offers the main entry point to initiate chat 1-1 ang group conversations with contacts.

Package com.gsma.services.rcs.chat Description

This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.
